    <facet>

      <value>main</value>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>

            <entry>mato_771</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Una carrera de coches lanzando dados</string>
            <string language="en">A car race throwing dice</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Werfende Würfel eines Autorennens</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Matrices de lancement d'une course de voiture</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Dados jogando de uma raça do carro</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Dadi gettanti della corsa dell'automobile</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια ρίψη φυλών αυτοκινήτων χωρίζει σε τετράγωνα</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">simulación interactiva que muestra una carrera de coches que avanzan a partir de la puntuación obtenida en el lanzamiento de dos dados</string>
            <string language="en">interactive simulation which shows a car race where the cars move according to the points they get throwing dice</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">dados</string>
            <string language="en">dice</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">suma</string>
            <string language="en">sum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">puntos</string>
            <string language="en">points</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">lanzamiento</string>
            <string language="en">throw</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">probabilidad</string>
            <string language="en">probability</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">interaktive Simulation, die einem Autorennen 
zeigt, wohin die Autos entsprechend den Punkten bewegen, erhalten sie 
werfende Würfel</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">simulation interactive qui montre à une course 
de voiture où le mouvement de voitures s'accordant aux points elles 
obtiennent les matrices de lancement</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">a simulação interativa que mostra a uma raça 
do carro aonde os carros se movem de acordo com os pontos começam 
dados jogando</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">simulazione interattiva che mostra ad una corsa 
dell'automobile dove gli automobili si muovono secondo i punti 
ottengono i dadi gettanti</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">η διαλογική προσομοίωση που εμφανίζει σε μια φυλή 
αυτοκινήτων όπου η κίνηση αυτοκινήτων σύμφωνα με τα σημεία που 
παίρνουν τη ρίψη χωρίζει σε τετράγωνα</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Würfel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Summe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
